means: 把（法律）编成法典( codify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In the meantime , however, Kennecott had been codified elsewhere in the Act.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, “肯尼考特”一案已被编人法案.

sentence.Network_en: Congress has since codified this holding.
sentence.Network_cn: 从那时以来,国会编纂整理了最高法院的这一裁定.

sentence.Network_en: The 1977 amendments essentially codified this consent decree.
sentence.Network_cn: 1977年的修正案实质上把双方同意的判决编入了法典.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 当判例发展到一定程度后，判例开始被“法典化”（codified），即被纳入制定法。同时，由奥立佛•霍姆斯大法官、卡尔•卢埃林教授和其 …
as a general rule of thumb , explicit knowledge consists of anything that can be documented , archived and codified , often with the help of IT .用一个常用的经验方法来说，显而易见的知识由任何能在IT技术的支持下被做成文档、档案和编码的东西组成。
the technical manuals , blueprints , and instruction books are the codified technical knowledge that could be seen as only the tip of the iceberg .技术手册，蓝图，和指令手册被认为是已编码的技术知识，仅仅是知识的冰山一角。
the body of codified laws governing affairs of a Christian church .管理基督教教会事物编成法典的法规主体。

list.abs: coder 编码器codified law 成文法-
codger 怪癖的人codifiability 编码可能性codification 编纂
构词法_百度百科 ... amplify（ 扩大）， codify（ 编纂）， beautify（ 使美丽），.
TOEFL词频表 - 豆丁网 ... code of law 法典 codify 编成法典，编辑成书 coexist 共同生存.
一种是可编码知识(codified knowledge)，信息(information)就是这一类知识。信息是容易编码并具有单独的含义且能释义的。
显性知识又称编码化知识（codified knowledge），是可以比较容易地整理、编码，具有单一的含义和内容。缄默知识是很难编码、隐 …

entry.tran: 编纂;整理;将(法规等)整理成典
entry.def: If you codify a set of rules, you define them or present them in a clear and ordered way.

example.ex: The latest draft of the agreement codifies the panel's decision.
example.tran: 最新的协议草案把专家小组的决定加以整理，形成了条文。

auth_sentence.content: Garrett's journey east takes a form that was codified back in the Sixties by those who embarked on similar journeys.
auth_sentence.res_content: Garrett's journey east takes a form that was codified back in the Sixties by those who embarked on similar journeys.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Garrett's journey east takes a form that was codified back in the Sixties by those who embarked on similar journeys.

auth_sentence.content: The word "lunatic" has been codified into US law so long it has outlasted its currency in the psychiatric profession.
auth_sentence.res_content: The word "lunatic" has been codified into US law so long it has outlasted its currency in the psychiatric profession.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The word "lunatic" has been codified into US law so long it has outlasted its currency in the psychiatric profession.

auth_sentence.content: This means repealing the laws introduced by the British colonial administration and codified in the Zambian penal code.
auth_sentence.res_content: This means repealing the laws introduced by the British colonial administration and codified in the Zambian penal code.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This means repealing the laws introduced by the British colonial administration and codified in the Zambian penal code.
